'''You Should Start A Doushin Dojo''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the commissions ''[[An Art to Be Honed]]'' and/or ''[[Ceaseless Training]]'' 5 times.
